event.title: analysed a specimen from the cow at the farm this weekend

data.event: The Swedish Board of Agriculture (Jordbruksverket) analysed a specimen from the cow at the farm this weekend.

event.title: many years, but as the affected cow was born

data.event: Such cattle feeds have been prohibited in Sweden for many years, but as the affected cow was born in 1994 she might have been given such food in her early life.
